Tree Species Classification by Darius Görgen

Direct Neighbourhood

Number of direct neighbours for each individual tree

This is a preview of the map of the number of direct neighbours for the University Forest Caldern. Unfortunatley, due to file size limitations on github, the fully interactive version of the map is hosted by servers of the Environmental Informatics Department of the University of Marburg. Be aware that the file size is above 100 MB.

This index was calculated by a ten centimeter buffer and counting the intersecting polygons in the neihborhood of each segment. The code to calculate the direct neigbours can be seen here. It thus indicates some measure of competition. By clicking on ploygons you will get addtional information including:
